mapper.select: select bi.block_id, bi.grid_id, bi.drug_id, ddi.drug_inf_id, di.drug_name, bi.serial from drug_cart_db.block_inf bi left join drug_cart_db.drug_date_inf ddi on bi.drug_id = ddi.drug_id left join drug_cart_db.drug_inf di on ddi.drug_inf_id = di.drug_inf_id

select bi.block_id, bi.grid_id, bi.drug_id, gi.drug_inf_id, bi.serial from drug_cart_db.block_inf bi inner join drug_cart_db.grid_inf gi on gi.grid_id = bi.grid_id inner join drug_cart_db.carts_inf ci on gi.cart_id = ci.cart_id where ci.cart_id = #{cartId}

select bi.block_id, bi.grid_id, bi.drug_id, ddi.drug_inf_id, di.drug_name, bi.serial from drug_cart_db.block_inf bi left join drug_cart_db.drug_date_inf ddi on bi.drug_id = ddi.drug_id left join drug_cart_db.drug_inf di on ddi.drug_inf_id = di.drug_inf_id where block_id = #{id}

select bi.block_id, bi.grid_id, bi.drug_id, ddi.drug_inf_id, di.drug_name, bi.serial from drug_cart_db.block_inf bi left join drug_cart_db.drug_date_inf ddi on bi.drug_id = ddi.drug_id left join drug_cart_db.drug_inf di on ddi.drug_inf_id = di.drug_inf_id where grid_id = #{gridId} and `serial` = #{serial}

select count(bi.block_id) from drug_cart_db.block_inf bi where bi.drug_id > 0
and bi.grid_id = #{gridId}
